Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: 40 UNDER 40
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind the scenes of the "40 under 40: Craft Futures" exhibition, featuring traditional and non-traditional works of decorative art created by the top 40 American craft artists under the age of 40.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Burlesque artist Dita von Teese drops by to find the perfect frock for a red-carpet event, while a costume designer from "Glee" shops for the cast's wardrobe. It's just another day at the office inside L.A.'s finest vintage store, The Way We Wore(r).

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Award season means four months of high-exposure events. It also means four months of madness for the vintage clothing boutique The Way We Wore(R). Follow store owner Doris Raymond and her team as they scout vintage gems for the stylists to the stars.

Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: 40 UNDER 40
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind the scenes of the "40 under 40: Craft Futures" exhibition, featuring traditional and non-traditional works of decorative art created by the top 40 American craft artists under the age of 40.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey of world famous Cape Breton Island reveals why this has been called the "world's greatest road trip" - from the Canso Causeway to the Cape Breton Highlands - the island is a world unto its own.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tecumseh forges an alliance with the British in pursuit of his dream of a unified First Nations.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Inquire as to whether the idea of a perfect society is, indeed, possible.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey of world famous Cape Breton Island reveals why this has been called the "world's greatest road trip" - from the Canso Causeway to the Cape Breton Highlands - the island is a world unto its own.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Award season means four months of high-exposure events. It also means four months of madness for the vintage clothing boutique The Way We Wore(R). Follow store owner Doris Raymond and her team as they scout vintage gems for the stylists to the stars.

Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: 40 UNDER 40
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind the scenes of the "40 under 40: Craft Futures" exhibition, featuring traditional and non-traditional works of decorative art created by the top 40 American craft artists under the age of 40.

Clip.Title: BLACK WINGS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the barnstorming era through World War II and into the jet age, the worlds of aviation and race relations intersect in these fascinating stories of courage and innovation.

Clip.Title: NAZI TEMPLE OF DOOM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover the astonishing secrets behind a recently found artifact. Our investigation uncovers a story of intrigue, shady deals, and a plot by Nazi leader Heinrich Himmler to create a sinister Camelot inside "The Nazi Temple of Doom," Germany's Wewelsburg Castle.

Clip.Title: MISSION TO MURDER HITLER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The operation Valkyrie to kill Hitler was led by German resistance willing to turn traitor to save lives. See how the plot was nearly carried out, through gripping re-enactments, and firsthand interviews from members of the resistance.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Scientists in Egypt look for ways to slow the alterations caused by the changing environment in the country.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Namibian Villagers are forced to abandon their lands as neighbouring Rivers swell and swallow up entire settlements.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join the Bionic Vet and his staff as they tend to a puppy in shock, a police dog in agony and a cat about to take her first (reluctant) dip into the center's hydrotherapy pool.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: One thousand miles off the southeast coast of Argentina sits the sub-Antarctic island of South Georgia in the Southern Ocean. About the size of Rhode Island, it's a breathtaking sight - long and narrow - shaped like a huge fractured whalebone. Massive glaciers, ice caps and snowfields cover about 75% of the island, but the land is far from desolate

Clip.Title: CREATURES OF THE LAGOON
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Marine biologists explore Florida's Indian River Lagoon to discover the secrets of the many fascinating creatures that inhabit it.

Clip.Title: HAUNT OF THE HARPY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get a bird's-eye view of the South American rainforest as we examine the hunting and rearing skills of Guyana's harpy eagle.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join the Bionic Vet and his staff as they tend to a puppy in shock, a police dog in agony and a cat about to take her first (reluctant) dip into the center's hydrotherapy pool.
